title: Bogdan Poniatowski
text:
Bogdan Poniatowski (November 6, 1931 – April 24, 2014) was a Polish rower. He competed in the Men's Coxless Fours event at the <a href="Rowing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Rome">Rome</a>, <a href="Italy">Italy</a>.
Poniatowski died at the age of 82 on April 24, 2014.
